website_summaries.verdict: Well-made LEDs w/superior backing by the mfr. You won't find a better LED candelabra option on the market today.
pros: Uses only 5 W of power while providing brilliant light that's not harsh
Backed by a 2 yr. warranty and friendly customer service
cons: Some complaints of broken or burned bulbs
manufacturer has been quick to replace faulty products

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 boxes (12 bulbs total) to have enough to change out all our ceiling fan lights (CFL and incandescent currently). Within the same day of putting 6 bulbs into two of our ceiling fans, several bulbs either had one or more "filament" go out, or the bulb would "disco" between dim and bright. Ended up chasing bad bulbs (replace one here and there) until I had no replacements left ... and I still only have 2 good bulbs ... for now. Missed the return window, but I will not recommend to anyone and I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BAD PARTS - early death
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to be perfect, but over a short amount of time, for life up to 13.7 years, these are dying off within 9 months. These begin dying by flickering. There is nothing wrong with the bulb in physical ways, but they just have cheaper diodes. I have written them and hope to write a positive follow up, but for now, I would suggest to stay away from these. It is NOT normal for them to be going out within the first year when they projected life is up to 13 years.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Great quality light.  Like many similar bulbs, not long-lasting.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the light is great, but after two years, most of them have failed. I use them a lot in the day, and I think other brands are probably not going to last longer. Still, I find it disappointing. The light output is a nice warm color, matching incandescent closely. I don't notice any flickering. Good bulbs while they last. In another room, I have used another brand, non-chandelier bulb with the same LED design as this one, and they also did not last long, so I don't think it's just Hudson that has this issue. We switched to Halogen bulbs in that room. I'll keep trying LED bulbs, but so far, it's been a rough ride.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY, NO RESPONSE FROM SELLER
customer_reviews.text: Update12/2/2017: Seller won't respond to warranty inquiry. WARNING, NO WARRANTY Failed after only 6 months. Seller says to email them if they fail but they do not give any email address. I'm sad and a bit disappointed. I guess I'll have to see if the seller responds to this review. ...otherwise, These are plenty bright, low cost to operate, Soft light. Mine are inside globes on my ceiling fan. You may not want to see the bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Afterwork Student

customer_reviews.title: Nice bulbs. Color is a warm white.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bulbs. Color is a warm white that looks inviting. They aren't overly bright. Best of all, they fit my bulb sockets that other LEDs (that cost 3 times the price) couldn't be screwed in enough to reach to contact. As long as they last - these will be my go to bulb for candelabra sockets. Update: I ordered another set of bulbs. Packaging was fine before but even better now. Shouldn't be any bulbs breaking during transit unless the delivery truck drives on the package. I also dealt with Hudson Lighting's customer service. They were top notch. Highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Brett V

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs and even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bulbs as part of a house-wide effort to convert as many bulbs as possible to LED lights. After comparing various brands and price points , I picked these because they seemed to be the best value as well as reviews for clear candelabra bulbs. Much to my chagrin, the first order arrived damaged, but Hudson Lighting customer service responded immediately in replacing the bulbs and they made the entire process seamless. Now, with the new bulbs installed, they look fantastic and provide a much clearer light than the original incandescent a that were in the chandelier. I would highly recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: D. Font

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, if using dimmer - make sure it's one that supports LED bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the sockets for the original bulbs but the ring at the the socket on the LED bulbs sits above the socket. Luckily my hanging lamp has white plastic covers that were large enough in diameter to hide the ring. These bulbs are very bright to look at - the original bulbs were bright but didn't seem to be as "intense". I replaced dimmer with one that supports LED and I have it set to 75% and it's bright enough to light up the room. Buying more because my hanging lamp has 8 sockets, box has 6 - my bad!
customer_reviews.author: K. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Light purity in question
customer_reviews.text: These are nice bulbs, but they appear to be missing the warm hues expected at a color temperature of 2700 K. The light emitted appears dull with a faint pale yellow hue. Almost want to reinstall my original bulbs to retain the lost color purity. I miss those warm hues such as orange and red which provided character and a sense of relaxation to my living room. The only other comment that I can add is no flickering issues and instant on.
customer_reviews.author: Detrick

customer_reviews.title: Good LED lights for the price and support
customer_reviews.text: Used these for outdoor lighting near my garage in 2016 ... tired of replacing incandescent bulbs. Very bright, correct color and looks good. I did have one bulb fail at about 16 months. I ordered six more to replace the one... figured claiming warranty for one bulb was not worth it and I have some other incandescent candelabra bulbs that I could replace.. When they contacting me to confirm my order they asked for any feedback so I did mention the one failure. They immediately offered to issue a refund for that bulb no questions asked. This company puts the customer first!
customer_reviews.author: ScottJ63

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding at the current price
customer_reviews.text: Since neither my neighbors nor the property management have been interested in replacing burned out post lamp bulbs in this development, I've been replacing the ones for my building and parking lots myself, having no interest in walking around in the dark. All have performed perfectly, the first ones having been in place for nearly 3 years now. At the current price I no longer have to resent it. The 2700 degree color and lumen output matches the old incandescents in the neighborhood so well that I doubt any of my neighbors have even noticed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Milliken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: What a difference, the cool bulbs instead of the hot incandescent bulbs. I would burn my fingers trying to clean the light fixture glass with the old bulbs. But these LED bulbs are cold to the touch, put out just as much light and actually are more decorative than the old ones. They arrived in packaging that guaranteed safe delivery with each bulb snugly cushioned in a cut out nest of foam. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Walker, Reviewer and Artist

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for outdoor lamp post bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bulbs to use in an outdoor lamp post. We have no control when these are turned on and off, so I wanted to make it more economical by using LED bulbs. I installed three of these, and although the wattage rating was the same as the ones previously installed (incandescent), they're a bit brighter. The softness of the light is perfect (2700K). I've only been using them around a month, so cannot attest to longevity, but so far, they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good: dies young
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in perfect condition. Love them! Nice solid quality. Looks good in my candelabra. Dims correctly. Nice colored light. Really good value. Update: I bought LEDs thinking they would last for years but in the past month, ONE year after installing them, half had started off flickering, then died.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela McClure

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for use with dimmer
customer_reviews.text: These LED lights work great in my dining room chandelier with my Lutron dimmer. They vary evenly from completely off to very bright, and they look great. I purchased these to replace some older style LED lights that would not completely turn off, and didn't look near as nice as these. I would definitely recommend these LED bulbs, especially if you have a dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Glen P.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got 5 light bulbs instead of 6 for some odd reason, they even had an empty space in the packaging for the 6th light bulb. That being said, the bulbs work pretty well and look nice. I have them hooked up to my Hunter 99375 Universal Ceiling Fan and the dimmer works perfectly. UPDATE: The seller sent a new box of lights to replace my one missing bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love these bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: I love the LED bulbs that look like the older-school, vintage style. These are warm white, and they are perfect! Can't speak to longevity as I haven't had them in any fixtures for super long--let's be real: are we gonna count the hours these things work right for? Pffft! Who's got time for that? So far they're great, and I'm very pleased! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: cafo123

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lights fit right in with the Room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these candelabra bulbs to fit some very small lamps that I have had for a long while and never used. I was able to use a 4-watt bulb that casts the warm glow of a 40 watt. It makes the whole room look great. I expect them to last a long time. They are cool to the touch and won't get warm like other standard bulbs,
customer_reviews.author: Tom37

customer_reviews.title: USA made- favorite dimmable, bright lighting
customer_reviews.text: quality product. responsive USA mfr. These are wonderful on all my dimmable lighting. The transition of light-to-dark is smooth and successive whereas others dimmable LED brands are more or less 3-stage lighting on a dimmer. I always look to see if Hudson Lighting offers the size/type of bulbs I need first.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Small diameter great warm light its the UN-LED Bulb!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, I am not a paid reviewer but love it when something works! these do not look like normal LED Chandelier bulbs. They are also smaller in diameter which allow them to fit into a globe which every other LED Candelabra bulb would not fit into. The look is great even when dimmed very warm look, which was also unlike a regular LED bulb. Great design! Thanks, Tom
customer_reviews.author: TOM C

customer_reviews.title: Look Good and save energy
customer_reviews.text: These are in my outdoor carriage lamps on a timer. Got 14 on one circuit and regular bulbs exceeded the rating of the timer. Bright and just the right color. I usually get about 7,000 hours out of them (close to 2 years), though I just replaced 2 after about 5,000. I was forever replacing the incandescent standard bulbs, these are definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MikeVGKfan

customer_reviews.title: Bright and dim to zero with no flicker.
customer_reviews.text: Longevity is still up in the air, but this bulbs work great. I wish I would've ordered these first!! I purchased the Amazon LED candelabra bulbs first, but because they had the white plastic under the bulbs I put them in the basement and ordered these to replace them. These are one of the only lights that dim all the way down to off! And they dont flicker at all. Will be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H.

customer_reviews.title: Working good!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these. I'm impressed with the quality packaging and how well they match my existing incandescent bulbs in both brightness and color temperature. They blend right in. So far I'm very pleased with the quality of the product and would purchase from Hudson again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 2 months and NO WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: One bulb out of the 6 started flickering half of its LEDs after about 2 months of very limited use. After another month, those LEDs stopped working all together. My Hudson Lighting bulbs were actually purchased from "iWentPrime" reseller. Hudson refuses to honor the warranty. iWentPrime has disappeared. No 3 months since purchase, 1 bulb completely dead, 4/6 bulbs have about half of their LEDs dead. This product is CRAP. Will try CREE brand from HomeDepot for about the same $. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel K Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Better than conventional lighting
customer_reviews.text: I have these light on a a dimmer in my dining room. Work well on the dimmer. Previously had conventional lighting and on occasion the heat from these light would burn the shade if the shade was not positioned perfectly. These lights are a safer bet and good value for LED lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Mighty Beau

customer_reviews.title: Neat Looking!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the current old filament bulbs on my chandelier. These are not only LED, which is what I was going for, but they look really cool. Also, my dining room no longer looks orange with the new lighting, so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: LovinLife

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have a total of 23 of these size bulbs used for outdoor lighting around my house. Prior to making the switch to LED bulbs, I used 40w incandescent bulbs consuming 920 watts of power. Now my lighting only consumes 92 watts. That's about the same power consumption as using less than three 40w incandescent bulbs. What a big difference it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Rob T.

customer_reviews.title: You cannot tell these are LED once installed
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our kitchen fan light... It's on a LOT. Couldn't be happier. The light is much better than our old bulbs. Not too bright. You cannot tell it's an LED bulb once it's in the light. Mine did have some small thin hairs of plastic on a few bulbs but they came right off. I thought they arrived cracked because of the thin plastic hair but all was good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be very well made bulbs with an exceptional "heavy glass" feel and they give off a nice warm bright light. Packaging was far superior to other bulbs I have purchased. Great product and we will order again when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Changed to "Caveat emptor / buyer beware - would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! No issues with LED bulbs upon receipt. Very well packaged. Bulbs installed and all working well. Follow up emails received by seller (to assure customer satisfaction) is top notch and shows they care about performance after the sale. Would highly recommend seller and product without hesitation. Thank you Hudson Lighting! UPDATE: 6 Bulbs installed in outdoor application (covered and enclosed garage and front porch lanterns). Almost to the exact date of install (1 yr later), 4 of the six bulbs no longer working. Providing this update so that potential buyers are aware longevity not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Free Enterprise

customer_reviews.title: Nice bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace some incandescent candelabra bulbs in the porch light. At 4 watts I can leave them on when my kids are out without worrying to much about the energy usage. Nice even soft white color. Too soon to tell about longevity.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Decent bulbs
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. They're as advertised I guess. Nice and bright, nicely white light. Don't have a dimmer on that switch yet so I don't know how well they do that yet. Overall complaint is the hot dog and bun issue... Needed 4, came in a pack of 6.
customer_reviews.author: E. Huemoeller

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. I’m embarrassed to admit how much research I did on lightbulbs but it definitely paid off. When you hang a $3000 chandelier, you don’t skimp on the bulbs. They’re brighter than I expected and I hope they last a long time since they are 20 feet up!
customer_reviews.author: D. Patton

customer_reviews.title: I bought these since they are LED and would last ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these since they are LED and would last long and three of 8 are already burned out. I used them also due to the light being difficult to access and now I have to go back up on the ladder to replace them. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: S. Garg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are exactly what I wanted/needed! They fit in my chandelier where some others would not and they look great too. They are indeed dimmable as well, going from barely on to full brightness with no dropouts. They arrive very quickly, exactly as advertised, and completely damage free. Excellent Seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiki Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs put out a lot of light for only 5 watts each. The color is very pleasing and very close to an actual incandescent bulb. They seem to be made well, are UL listed, and came packed very nicely. They are on a light without a dimmer so I cannot comment on their dimming capabilities. Overall highly recommended. Please note I did not receive any compensation or discount for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Dimmable  LED
customer_reviews.text: We use these bulbs to replace the candelabra-base incandescent lamps in our church nave. Because of the reduced current, we can now use a dimmer on these lamps, which lowers their intensity when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Thad

customer_reviews.title: Looks great around dock
customer_reviews.text: The company is fantastic and they have truly lived up to their warranty. Unfortunately they bulbs have not lasted as long as I would have hoped they would have. Nevertheless, I keep buying them since they look great and like supporting a great group of representatives.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Bright yellow
customer_reviews.text: we purchased these lights because it hide the white base and was clear over the whole bulb, but the middle of the light is always yellow, even when off. can't attest for how well they worked because we returned them. If you're looking for clear bulbs with all white these are not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dimmable bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Great bulbs! Well packed (lots of cushion), directly replaced the incandescents. The light is the warm white 2700k, and matched the old incandescents perfectly. Additionally, the bulbs dim with no issues - dimming works great! Lot of issues with other LEDs on that feature - so very pleased at the performance overall!
customer_reviews.author: K. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Good color, no buzz or strobe!
customer_reviews.text: These are the 3rd LEDs I have tried in a set of bathroom sconces. Finally! They are perfect. Excellent color temperature and color reproduction. No buzz or flicker. They dimm down to almost zero. And most important, steady light with absolutely No STROBE. Previous LED bulbs would stobe, causing any moving object to leave tracers, especially water from the sink or shower.
customer_reviews.author: Evan R ATX

customer_reviews.title: Nice bulbs and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought 18 of these bulbs about 1 1/2 years ago for a dining room chandelier and bathroom light fixtures. The brightness and color of the bulbs are perfect for the dining room and dim wonderfully with a Lutron dimmer; for my bathroom, great for applying makeup. I recently had two bulbs go out though and contacted Hudson's customer service and within hours, I had instructions on how to get replacements. Three days later, I had my replacement bulbs in hand. I'm hoping that the longevity of the remaining bulbs is longer than the two that were replaced, but Hudson stood by their product and I'm happy right now.
customer_reviews.author: KHK

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I hoped!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with these bulbs for my outdoor fixtures. Their brightness is more like 50W than the advertised 40W. Read competitor's fine print closely -- some cheaper bulbs are not UL listed and not recommended for damp/outdoor locations or enclosed fixtures. I'll definitely buy from Hudson Lighting again!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit in my fan
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews , I was concerned these would not work in my Hampton Bay ceiling fan. They work great ! Now thinking about changing out the upper lights on this fan. But that will be harder to do. We will think about that !
customer_reviews.author: M. J. swink

customer_reviews.title: OK.
customer_reviews.text: No problems, complaints, or issues. Exactly as described. No problems fitting into the light fixture. Even the package was not difficult to open. UPDATE: The three bulbs only lasted a year and were never used with the dimmer. I thought the light output was too dim for my use in the ceiling fan in my small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Creaky

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to last years
customer_reviews.text: They were very well packaged, looked top quality, and worked well. Just got them, so I cannot say anything about longevity. Keep in mind that LEDs will only save money if they last.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper 1747

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: They look good but one of the bulbs came with the base broken off. We had to use them since we were having company but then only had 11 of the 12 bulbs we paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Finkle

customer_reviews.title: Durability issues
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking bulbs but they gradually lose their brightness. After a year, they are basically done. One bulb has gone out completely and the others are much more dull than they were originally. If they could extend the lifespan I would recommend them, but as of now I can't.
customer_reviews.author: A reader from New York

customer_reviews.title: Never buy light bulbs at a store again
customer_reviews.text: I will always buy light bulbs from Hudson lighting from now on!!! The frustration of staring at a long isle full of lightbulb choices is over! Hudson delivers on quality, price and usability.
customer_reviews.author: Glenna L. Dunagan

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly with both dimmers.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 82 year old mother that was using a reduced number of incandescent 40 watt bulbs in her 12 bulb chandelier. She liked them so much that we ended up buying another 6 for her other light.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Candelabra Styled LED Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Converted incandescent bulbs in entry foyer to these LED bulbs. Attractive candelabra styling and good light levels. True "warm white" intensity. Would definitely recommend if you are considering replacing incandescent bulbs requiring a candelabra shape and an E12 base. Note That I did not use these in a dimmable fixture so I cannot comment on the dimmable claim in the product description. For a non-dimmable fixture, I would consider these bulbs to be first rate.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great bulb
customer_reviews.text: Just got them today and installed one right away. It's just the right size and brightness that we needed. Can't really comment on longevity yet as we just got them. Part of the reason we went with these is it is an American company.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly43

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my Hot with Cool
customer_reviews.text: Definitely updated my chandelier with these dimming cool color lights. The bulbs are much more pleasing and they do get very bright. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Buys Prime

customer_reviews.title: As described, great color, well packaged. Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bulbs. Very well packaged (protected) in a well padded box (may be overkill, but hopefully they tested their options!). The light color is warm - almost as warm as the incandescent bulbs in my dining room (these are intended for outdoor use, but to check if they were all good, I tried them on at a time in my chandelier next to the 7 other incandescent bulbs). They look ver nice outside on either side of my entrance. Time will tell how robust or long-lasting they are
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Lights out
customer_reviews.text: We loved these at first, but they don’t lasts that Long. Maybe we got a bad batch, will try and order more when we have extra funds to see if second batch is better.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Hignite

customer_reviews.title: These are high quality bulbs
customer_reviews.text: The difference between these bulbs and the "big box" bulbs is incredible. I can't believe I originally put the big box bulbs into our dining room chandelier. When I switched them with these bulbs I was stunned at the improvement. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Great Dining Room Light!
customer_reviews.text: This light looks great in our dining room. It is just the right size for this space. We are enjoying the light we get from this fixture. It was packaged well also.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great candelabra lights
customer_reviews.text: The last light sin my house that needed to be replaced were the candelabras in my dining room. I had tried other LEDs before, but they either had bad color, or the aesthetics were terrible. These lights have beautiful color, great aesthetics, and are extremely bright. Great product, and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Henriksen

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and great soft color.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bulbs. Emits a good stream of light and soft warm color. Will order another pack to hold onto to for many years.
customer_reviews.author: DarkSunRider

customer_reviews.title: Better than incandescent and older LEDs
customer_reviews.text: I use these on a few outdoor light fixtures by my doors. I replaced some LED bulbs from about 5 to 7 years ago and these are far superior. No ugly white plastic base and the light is brighter and emits from the sides versus pointing toward the tips. It's nice to have functional lighting again for 1/8 the power draw
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: I wanted dimmable bulbs like these that looked like normal bulbs for our 12 ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted dimmable bulbs like these that looked like normal bulbs for our 12 light chandelier that is the focal point of out big great room. i was really picky and looked at several stores before ordering from Hudson. I ended up purchasing several 6 packs and several singles. These are 5 watts instead of 6 (i had been using 60 watts), and i thought they might be dimmer, but they are brighter and I love them. saving money in awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell all
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs appear well manufactured. The light is mild, considering the wattage. We'll see how it performs on the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: great lights, excellent packaging
customer_reviews.text: the lights arrived perfectly packed in styrofoam cut outs so they could not bounce against one another. this is the first time i've seen this. the light color and brightness were also perfect
customer_reviews.author: Steven E

customer_reviews.title: All bulbs arrived unbroken!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I bought lightbulbs on line. I was hesitant because they are so fragile but these arrived safely packed in foam cut out to fit each bulb. The bulbs are in our fish weather vane chandelier and look great. :) So much cooler than standard bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: ShallowGal

customer_reviews.title: The bulbs are absolutely perfect for our use - perimeter lantern type fixtures on ...
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are absolutely perfect for our use - perimeter lantern type fixtures on the front of our house and garage. We did have some issues with our initial ones failing early but the company has been absolutely terrific in replacing without cost or hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Weismehl

customer_reviews.title: Love how they look!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is dimming these. I went out and bought the suggested dimmer, but it didn't help. They still flicker when I dim them. Other than that, I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Katydid

customer_reviews.title: Best LED Candelabra bulbs I've bought
customer_reviews.text: Best LED Candelabra bulbs I've bought. Finally a true replacement in terms of size and most importantly a fully clear glass bulb - a must in the types of chandeliers I needed the bulbs for. The light at 2700 is just slightly less yellow than the incandescent at full brightness, but still warm. Dims perfectly, and really looks good dim, bright or off. I was an early adopter, and have a lot of the bulbs where only the top half is clear... I may take the hit and replace them all with these - they are that good.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Drake

customer_reviews.title: Good looking lights, but some flicker over time
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights but buy extra as probably 1/3 will start flickering over the first few months.
customer_reviews.author: jonmck

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Replaced bulbs in a 6 bulb chandelier. The 7W CFs were approaching 6 years and phosphors had lost enough luminance to be unsatisfactory. These Hudson bulbs are of good brightness and distribute light evenly. Good value, too.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these bulbs 9 months ago and like the warmth of the white light they provide. Two of the 6 bulbs burned out recently (using a proper LED dimmer), so there appears to be some variability in the product quality. However, after a quick email, two replacement bulbs were on their way to us on the same day (on a Sunday...). It is good to know they stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Anja Hoehler

customer_reviews.title: LED Chandelier replacement bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Great look when lit and work great with my dining room dimmer switch. How they last will be the deciding factor but so far there is ZERO flicker and light is very clean and stable.
customer_reviews.author: KGB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect candelabra LED bulb
customer_reviews.text: I tried several candelabra LED bulbs, and the Hudson bulbs work the best. The color temperature is warm, which is what I wanted, and they dim very well. They are cool to the touch, so there is no danger of burning lamp shades, which is easy to do with incandescent bulbs. All bulbs in the pack were functional. I would definitely buy Hudson bulbs again.
customer_reviews.author: Osman Eralp

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Have slowly been replacing all the incandescent bulbs in the house as they burn out with these- very pleased! Good light, look great.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy in VA

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: True amber color in an LED bulb. I've purchased multiple LED bulbs before with little satisfaction. Then I found these bulbs which match the original incandescent tone. A winner!
customer_reviews.author: Colin Strub

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I cannot comment on longevity or energy efficiency because I’ve only had them a month but they make my dining room look beautiful! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The shape and size is good, the color of light is very pleasant and they are nice and bright! They also dim very well; no flicker. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: quintillion977

customer_reviews.title: These are horrible!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! All of these have dimmed so bad that they do not work. Some have just completely gone out.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Gunlock

customer_reviews.title: Very warm atmosphere.
customer_reviews.text: These were just perfect for our kitchen and gave us just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Goose

customer_reviews.title: Dimmable, useful in Wet Locations.
customer_reviews.text: Packed very well. 120v as stated. Dimmable and for use in Wet Locations. Nice surprise as well as a Bonus 1 year warranty. Quick one day delivery from this great small company!
customer_reviews.author: Trainop

customer_reviews.title: 4W bulbs are bright and dimmable
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the delivery. I have an older dimmer and the bulbs works with them without any noise are reported in other reviews. They are bright and just what we needed for a new chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Alchemy

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Look great! Just got them so I can't speak for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: lizd

customer_reviews.title: Burned out inless than 2 months!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a 6 pack of the dimmable candelabra lights and in less than 60 days of light to moderate use 3 bulbs have already burned out. Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: madhat85

customer_reviews.title: Great lights and received same day delivery!
customer_reviews.text: My lights on my dining room chandelier look beautiful with these light bulbs and the dimming feature with my Lutron switches is just as I would like. The lights on high are too bright for me but that is to be expected. The important thing is that the setting on low is more than “low enough”. The packaging was great and kept these light bulbs safe from any damage in shipping and I got these lights on the same day I ordered them from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Great company!
customer_reviews.text: These lights look great and bring a classic look to any light fixture. The most impressive part is the customer service provided by Hudson Lighting. I had a couple of them burn out after about 6 months. I sent a message to Hudson Lighting telling them of this and got an immediate response that new replacements will be sent. It’s great to see a company stand behind their products and provide flawless support.
customer_reviews.author: B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service Respose
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised, but two bulbs stopped working in less than a year. Hudson customer service quickly responded and replaced the bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: CWS

customer_reviews.title: Life span of only 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Well, it’s 1 year in and half the bulbs are dramatically dimmer or almost out. Only 2 of the 6 still appears near original brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The best candelabra LEDs I've found
customer_reviews.text: These are phenomenal bulbs. I've bought a lot of LED light bulbs and these are among the best. They're very bright with a nice warm color, and beautiful to look at. Most LED candelabra bulbs have a bulky, ugly white section at the bottom, but these look as good as incandescents. I'm currently using them in outdoor fixtures, but I tried a couple in a dimmable fixture inside and they work great there, too.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I little to early to give a review of these ...
customer_reviews.text: I little to early to give a review of these bulbs. I replaced other similar bulbs from a different manufacturer that ended up flickering badly or failing all together, I installed these candelabra LED bulbs into wall sconces on an Insteon dimmer and so far I've had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candelabra bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs were safely packaged, all 9 I installed worked, they are all the same brightness (and the brightness advertised, natch), and they look beautiful both turned on and off. In short, they met or exceeded all expectations I had. Five stars. The seller does not have close-up photos of the bulbs turned on; I have attached two.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finishing touch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought five new light fixtures and needed these kind of bulbs. Very happy with them and make all my new fixture more beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great E12 daylight bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product and all the lights worked. I like the daylight white light.
customer_reviews.author: Sgc137

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a great price, And they'll pay for them selves over time.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, bright, warm white bulbs. I used them on my outdoor light fixtures. Note that they come in both a rounded and a flame tip design.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Used for black fixture
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for my light application that required clear bulbs. I used in a black fixture where I didn't want the unsightly white bezel that many LEDs of this type have.
customer_reviews.author: Flip1950

customer_reviews.title: Great warm color
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Put all six bulbs in chandelier over dining table. Great color and smooth dimming. Won’t know how long they last for years (I hope).
customer_reviews.author: dmoily

customer_reviews.title: Fair Price & Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: After searching tediously for the proper bulbs with little luck, I finally found these. They are packaged well and include a small information slip about Hudson's partnership with Watts of Love. The price was fair and the bulbs are of great quality. I'm thankful to have these that will last a long time instead of replacing non-LED bulbs repeatedly. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: They were receivied in great condition very well packed. I haven't tried the dimming yet other than the bulbs are exactly what I was looking for they are of a small enough size we can get them in our fixture where there is little finger room
customer_reviews.author: Curbdiver

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: In a 9 bulb lamp with dimmer switch so great to adjust for mood. Bought 2 packs of 6 that went through some rough shipping. 1 of the first 9 died on arrival. The next is still with the original 8 after 4+ months. I'd rebuy, but feel it's premature to give a 5 star on longevity.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martz

customer_reviews.title: They look almost as good as the incandescent bulbs being replaced
customer_reviews.text: Items arrived on time, on price and as described. They look almost as good as the incandescent bulbs being replaced, and the light output is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: John Niles

customer_reviews.title: Dims beautifully with a Lutron TGCL-153PR
customer_reviews.text: No hum or flicker. The adjustment dial on the Lutron TGCL-153PR switch allows you get the range from almost no light to full power.
customer_reviews.author: mother of 5 wild children

customer_reviews.title: Half failed out of the box
customer_reviews.text: They do look good, but -Half failed out of the box and another of the three that originally worked failed in less than 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

product_meta.title: Dimmable E12 LED Candelabra Bulb Set - 4W, 40W Equivalent - 2700K Warm White - Small Base Candle Lightbulb for Chandelier, Ceiling Fan, Sconce, Desk Lamp or Porch Lights - Pack of 6
feature_bullets: ✅ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We are a US-based company with exceptional and responsive customer service! We work closely with our manufacturers to produce top-quality Candelabra LED Bulbs for our customers.
✅ DIMMER COMPATIBLE: Adjust the brightness to fit any setting with these LED Dimmable Light Bulbs. Use with a Leviton or Lutron dimmer switch for optimal results.
✅ ENERGY EFFICIENT: Manufactured to last with energy-saving LED filaments, our LED Candelabra Bulb only uses 4 watts of power and keeps more money in your pocket!
✅ BEST USE: Our E12 LED Bulb features a candelabra, medium-sized base which are most commonly suited for small lamps, sconces, chandeliers, ceiling fans and porch lights.
✅ STYLE: Clear glass paired with Edison-style, exposed LED filaments give off a classic, throwback look while emitting a warm-white, neutral modern glow.
